Yamagata prefecture in the north of Japan's main island Honshū 本州[Ben3 zhou1]

sentences.english: Yamagata also have 7 people were killed, more than 65 years, 4 people.
sentences.chinese: 此外山形县也有7人死亡，其中65岁以上者有4人。

sentences.english: What was this classical pediment with a circle shape cut out of the centre?
sentences.chinese: 从中心切除一个圆形的正统山形墙是什么？

sentences.english: This is a message from the Yamagata International Documentary Film Festival Office.
sentences.chinese: 这是来自山形国际纪录片节办公室的邮件。

sentences.english: The lines represent a mountainous underwater area in the Atlantic Ocean.
sentences.chinese: 线条表现出位于大西洋水下一个山形区域。

sentences.english: Yamagata Miyagi Prefectural to go to the bus stop, from yesterday overcrowded.
